bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition of women whose spirit is depressed and who feel sad and begin to weep for no apparent reason. Jin gui yao lue 金匱要略 Lj: 婦人臟躁，喜悲傷欲哭，象如神靈所作，數欠 伸，甘麥大棗湯主之 , “When females suffer from depot restlessness, they tend to be harmed by sadness and wish to weep. It seems as if a spirit had caused this. They frequently yawn and stretch their body. The decoction with gan [ cao ],
